levels.effect:

Active: Instead of Slowing, Binds targets for 1.6 seconds. Retreats all drones after this effect ends

elite_levels.description: Can use up to 3 drones that do not block (max 3 deployed at once). Drones' effect changes based upon Skill.
Can use up to 4 drones that do not block (max 3 deployed at once). Drones' effect changes based upon Skill.
Can use up to 5 drones that do not block (max 3 deployed at once). Drones' effect changes based upon Skill.
Drones gain Invisibility for 12 seconds after deployment (cannot be targeted by enemy ranged attacks)
Drones gain Invisibility for 20 seconds after deployment (cannot be targeted by enemy ranged attacks)

potential_upgrades.description: Drones gain Invisibility for 14 (+2) seconds after deployment (cannot be targeted by enemy ranged attacks)
Drones gain Invisibility for 22 (+2) seconds after deployment (cannot be targeted by enemy ranged attacks)
